system.description: At 14th level, whenever you reduce a creature with blood to 0 hit points in an outdoor setting, you can summon a corrupted creature of grave earth and necrotic vines from a space adjacent to it. Treat this as a free casting of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.633bpp281x35cz6t]{Conjure Elemental} spell cast with an effective 6th-level spell slot, except it can only conjure an earth elemental, the creature’s bonus damage is necrotic, and it has the undead type in addition to the elemental type. Once you have used this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum once), you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
